(I'm gonna wake up now)

::CyberShark::

    He awoke in Hot Rod. He looked=
 around, wondering what had happened. (Really what did happen, wern't we su=
pposed to get the bots in the brig?) He thought of Battera, a slight tremor=
 went through his heart, he wondered if he still loved her, and visa versa.=
 He looked at his blade arm, and thought to check his cloaking. But, he did=
n't want the others to know all of his abilities, so he only cloaked the ti=
p of his blade, it worked and just as quickly he decloaked it. (It was just=
 a tip, not something that you'd know of if you didn't know his abilities)
=
  ----- Original Message ----- 
  From: RoboRick007 
  To: nbwrpg@egroups.c=
om 
  Sent: Monday, October 02, 2000 11:11 AM
  Subject: Escape


  ::Hot R=
od::

  Still carrying cybershark, Hot Rod ran past Feline, and outside.
  =
"Vehicle mode." He tranformed to car mode, as Cybershark landed in the
  pa=
ssenger seat.
  "Get in Feline!" He yelled.
